ygData.subject: outside vrs inside
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m ambivalent about it.  I like dungeons just as much as outdoors...if you know the right spots, dungeons can actually be safer than outdoors once you
ygData.messageBody:
>I just use what ever works. I do prefer outside much more than inside.
>It's too hard to run away inside and Jboots only work outside.

I'm ambivalent about it. I like dungeons just as much as outdoors...if you
know the right spots, dungeons can actually be safer than outdoors once you
control which mobs aggro on you.

I tried experimenting with killing WC guards last night... they conned blue
to me at 34, but I still had difficulty soloing them. My friend convinced
me that it's excellent xp. Anyway, the standard tactic of root, run, and
nuke was not working very well for me. A lot of resists and a bunch of
half-fizzled nukes. :P I'm not a very good solo wizzie, I don't know how
you solo guys do it. :) I don't trust root at all.

-- Lim'Dul
